entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
